page.title: 17Communications
page.content: Dawlish Post Office was purpose built at its present site in I959. Staffing is as follows: Postmaster, 5 Postal officers, 2 Postmen higher grade, 10 full time Postmen and 6 part time postmen and two cleaners. All the staff working at this Post office live in the Dawlish area.The volume of mail is 7,000 letters and packets, and 125 parcels daily. Other means of communication are by telephone to all parts of England and the world. We also get international news on radio and television. In the last few years there has been a citizens band radio where individuals can speak to each other.
